document_data.name: Lhaerom
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lhaerom''' was a guard in the [[House of the Ladystar]], a temple to [[Mystra]], during the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Many things, lord, most of which I leave to your wits to conjure up. There is one thing of comfort we undertake, which I suspect me your question seeks: we make soup. Pots and pots of it, as good and rich as we can manage. We let all partake, or at least smell if they cannot sup.|Lhaerom, 767 DR}}
document_data.Description: He was a head taller than the Bright Master, high priest of the House of the Ladystar, who was in turn quite tall.
document_data.History: Lhaerom was one of the guards at the House of the Ladystar during the chaos of [[the Art]] in the {{yearlinkName|767}}. About two [[tenday]]s into it, he helped keep a mob away from the temple, and accidentally offended the high priest inside as well. However, he then gave the priest, at the moment over his head with the situation, a good idea on how to proceed. He also gave indications that he had participated in at least one siege.
